reviews.review_text:
The TREE TOP TAVA one of the best Restaurants in South Goa. Hands down, one of the best food I've had recently! They use the freshest ingredients and makes sure each dish is done the right way. I was blown away by the service of this restaurant. The staff was incredibly knowledgeable about the menu and offered excellent recommendations. This restaurant strikes the perfect balance between chic and cozy. The ambience is trendy yet comfortable, making it ideal for intimate dinners.
Overall dining in this restaurant was delightful from starting to finish. The delicious food, impeccable service and charming ambience made for memorable experience

Treetop Tava Restaurant in Goa offers a memorable dining experience with its scenic views, relaxing ambiance, and delicious food. Perched atop a building, the restaurant boasts impressive views of the surrounding area, making it an ideal spot for a sunset meal or a peaceful evening under the stars. The view adds a unique charm to the whole dining experience, setting a beautiful backdrop for enjoying a meal.

The ambiance at Treetop Tava is both cozy and inviting, with soft lighting and a laid-back vibe that makes you feel instantly at ease. Itâ€™s perfect for both small gatherings and quiet dinners, creating a space where you can enjoy good company or a bit of solitude with a view.

Treetop Tava Restaurant is a great choice for those looking to combine a relaxed atmosphere, scenic views, and tasty food while dining in Goa.

Come here in the evening and chill best place and full marks for its location.
Even food and cocktails are decent.
Compact place with limited seats and they have WiFi so you can easily spend your evening even if you are alone.checkout pics to know what I am talking about.you will have to park your car roadside and walk down a bit to reach here.they have clean washroom also.
